mapper.select: SELECT FREENO, TITLE, WRITER, HIT FROM FREE ORDER BY FREENO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE(FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, IP, HIT) VALUES (FREE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, '127.0.0.1', 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE FREENO = #{freeno}
